title: Meagan 3-piece Pillow Top Arms Living Room Set Brown
Shelby 3-piece Tufted Upholstered Living Room Set Grey and Brown
Persia 2-piece Modular Sectional Grey
description: Add style to your space with this magnificent Mid-Century Modern sectional sofa. This low profile 2-piece sectional is exceptionally upholstered in a textured cool grey woven fabric accented with contrast blanket stitching in beige. Equally appealing is the beige platform base with tall tapered legs. On one end, it features a wide track armrest, while the other is open-ended in a chaise-like design. Two included throw pillows give this sectional added coziness.

title: Saybrook 3-piece Tufted Cushion Motion Living Room Set Charcoal and Black
description: A stylish living room ensemble is the perfect setup for entertainment. Manual reclining mechanisms allow you to relax through your favorite TV series. All pieces are designed for comfort with soft fabric and padded cushioning. Find the surprise of built-in cup holders within the sofa and loveseat to keep drinks on hand, along with two USB ports and power outlet inside the loveseat. Choose this set for your modern living area.

title: Southwick 2-piece Pillow Top Arm Power Living Room Set Saddle Brown
description: Wrapped in a soft and smooth top grain leather in a rich saddle brown hue, this power sofa and power loveseat are the perfect pair for a spacious entertainment room or living room. With modern touches, each piece includes a convenient switch panel and USB outlets, ideal for charging personal handheld devices as you watch TV or take a midday nap. Each furniture piece also features a space-saving, wall hugger mechanism that allows you to stretch back and kick up your feet. Beneath the leather upholstery is cool gel memory foam, as well as supportive pocket coil seating, and Certi-Pur certified foam filling. Place this upholstered reclining set within a contemporary style space to add a more regal flair.

title: Saybrook 3-piece Tufted Cushion Power Living Room Set Charcoal and Black
description: Modern yet sophisticated, this stylish living room set will add comfort to your living area. All pieces are crafted with cool gel memory foam for lasting comfort. Microfiber fabric adds softness and style. You'll love the power recliner option to kick back to your favorite series. Find a storage compartment within the loveseat and two USB charging ports.

title: Waterbury 2-piece Pillow Top Arm Motion Living Room Set Brown
description: Bring the family over for a big game and enjoy the comfort of this two-piece sofa and loveseat set. With manual reclining mechanisms, you'll feel that you scored a big win with this set. Incredible comfort is found with the padded cushioning and overstuffed armrests. Place your favorite beverage within the cup holders on the loveseat for ultimate convenience. This set looks striking in home theater rooms or modern living areas.

title: Shallowford 2-piece Power^2 Living Room Set Hand Rubbed Charcoal
description: Designed with a spacious entertainment room in mind, this two-piece power recliner sofa and loveseat feature a hand rubbed, charcoal top grain leather that's incredibly supple to the touch.Padded arms and headrests have white stitching details for contrast.This sofa also offers a wall hugger mechanism so you don't have to accommodate extra space.Digital control panel display, integrated Bluetooth speakers, USB outlets and stainless steel cup holders provide everything you need to relax for hours at a time.Place this reclining living room set in a contemporary or transitional home for comfortable seating.

title: Wagner 6-piece Modular Power^2 Sectional Light Grey
description: Place this plush, extra-wide power sectional in a transitional living room for ultimate comfort and support.With a wall hugger mechanism, this sectional can provide extra floor space.Switch panels, USB and home buttons are incorporated into each side.In addition, this expansive sectional offers cool gel memory foam topper and is wrapped entirely in a soft, light grey velvet.Perfectly suited for a contemporary home, the sectionals lightly colored upholstery works with existing color palettes.

title: Nashua 2-piece Reversible Sectional with Storage Ottoman French Blue
description: Bring home a new family favorite for any living space. This reversible 2-piece transitional sectional with storage is a great addition to any space. Lounge in comfort on the removable seat and back cushions and rest your elbows on the track arms, all of which are accented with self-welt details and upholstered in a baby blue woven fabric. As an added bonus, grid tufting is fashioned into the top side of each seat cushion. For convenience, a hidden storage compartment is available in the ottoman underneath the chaise, all atop the glam of tapered metal legs in silver.

title: Mccord 2-piece Cushion Back Sectional Dark Grey
description: Enjoy a new family favorite for your living room, den, or entertainment room. This reversible 2-piece transitional sectional is a handsome addition to your home. Lounge in comfort on the plush dark grey chenille fabric seat and back cushions and rest your elbows on the armrests, all accented with self-welt details. Extra throw pillows come included for those occasions when a nap is necessary. For convenience, the reversible spacious chaise is perfect to recline on, and the dark brown tall tapered legs give the sectional added height.

title: Shallowford 3-piece Upholstered Power^2 Sectional Hand Rubbed Charcoal
description: Behold the majesty of a magnificently designed leather sectional sofa. This sensational three-piece power motion sectional will command attention as the showstopper in your living space. It consists of a sofa, loveseat, and wedge, all upholstered in sumptuous, hand rubbed charcoal top grain leather that is luxurious to the touch. It has everything, too, starting with power reclining seats with power headrests to a state-of-the-art iTable drop down with digital control panel display, integrated Bluetooth speakers with auxiliary input/output, dual power outlets, dual USB outlets, and dual QI wireless chargers in the sofa. The loveseat includes a console featuring soft-closing lift top storage, two (2) removable stainless steel inserts, switch panel with USB, and a home button, making this sectional you'll never want to leave.
